attributes.action: Pay the Companies not the pensioners and keep said pensioners warm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Goverment should pay the  fuel companies the £250 ...
Instead of giving it to Pensioners in cash . 
Whereby they could then turn on heating fom Oct 31 to end of march without the fear of a huge bill and dying  from hypthermia  and do the same for severely disabled people .
they have the means to do this through the Tax credit  facilies ensuring that the money goes were its needed  rather than to every body  who doesn't need it
